website_summaries.verdict: Worth considering if you want a warm, stylish snowboarding jacket and prefer a loose, relaxed fit.
pros: A warm jacket that looks great in the snow
owners rave about the bold colors
Has numerous pockets and a removable faux fur collar
cons: Fit isn't as body-hugging as others we considered, and sizes run large
Occasional stuck or broken zippers noted

customer_reviews.title: Cute but lose for petite women
customer_reviews.text: Really cute but the smallest size “small” isn’t very slimming on me 5’5 and 125 pounds. the inside is very warm only because it is efficient at keeping heat not because of the fleece with is not an extremely soft texture but like a flattened blanket. however it keeps me very warm in 28F degree weather. Wish amazing offered XS like it offers in the pictures
customer_reviews.author: Brooke

customer_reviews.title: Very warm
customer_reviews.text: Loved this jacket! Took it on a trip to Colorado and kept me very warm in negative degree weather. I’m 5’3” and weigh 148lbs and ordered a medium
customer_reviews.author: Holli Ross

customer_reviews.title: The jacket isn’t as slimming as the picture shows but it will keep me warm and I like the fluffy hood
customer_reviews.text: I’m 5’6 and 135 lbs and got a medium. Fit well! The jacket isn’t as slimming as the picture shows but it will keep me warm and I like the fluffy hood.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and great for the price
customer_reviews.text: Super cute and warm jacket. A bit boxier and shorter than it seems from the picture but overall a great winter jacket. Blue color is really nice.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: The jacket itself felt super warm and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I'm 5'2 and 115lbs. I bought the M because so many reviews said to size up but it was a little too big on me. I looked too puffy and the hood covered half my face when I put in on. The jacket itself felt super warm and comfortable. I will be returning but I will buy it again in a smaller size.
customer_reviews.author: Brenda

customer_reviews.title: XL what a laugh
customer_reviews.text: I received this product quickly. I bought it for my daughter. When she went to put it on it was to small. According to the tag it showed it was a XL. I took my daughters older jacket that says XL and placed them side by side. Not only was it smaller the sleeves where at least 2in shorter. Not sure if this was a mistake or not. Other than that it was nice.
customer_reviews.author: Tim

customer_reviews.title: Great coat for the price
customer_reviews.text: Really love this coat. Purchased to experience the northern lights in Norway in January and it will keep me toasty. I normally wear a size 4, but I had to get this in a large. The coat runs small and I wanted room to wear base layers and at least a sweater underneath. However, I don't find the large to be too big.
customer_reviews.author: Kathryn P. Koslow

customer_reviews.title: I love this coat
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a shorter coat for working around a barn-like area. This perfectly fits the bill. It is a very light coat, so I was worried that it wouldn't be warm but so far I haven't been cold yet. I am being sensible in dressing under this coat, if it is freezing I wear a sweatshirt too, but I would do that with any coat. It is also pretty waterproof. I wore it to Vancouver where it rained every day and I was always dry. Many people have mistaken this coat for one that would be much more expensive. I'm super happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: H. Natola

customer_reviews.title: Not warm enough
customer_reviews.text: I bought this coat because of all the reviews that said it would be extremely warm and great for skiing. However, I was disappointed. I decided to go on a walk around the neighborhood to test it out. It was around 30 degrees F, and I was getting cold after only a few minutes. Specifically, the arms don't have enough insulation. It's great in terms of water and wind resistance, but it just isn't that warm. Also, the zipper falls in a weird place when the jacket is fully zipped, making it scratch against my chin and neck. I returned it because I needed something warmer for Michigan winters.
customer_reviews.author: Kirstin

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: very nice coat to wear if caught in rain as it is here in the NW. very well made.
customer_reviews.author: Capt Larry Rocho

customer_reviews.title: Warm and dry for snowboarding
customer_reviews.text: Took this jacket to Mammoth for snowboarding for a couple days. Unzipped it and wore less layers when I was too hot/near the base & fully zipped it up to keep warmer at the summit. Kept the wind and snow out without any issues. The fleece lining makes it so you can layer as little or much as you need, but there are no vents so keep that in mind. Wore it at night when it was around 20 degrees farenheit & was plenty warm. Worked well for my needs and has the basic features. I’m 167 lbs, 5’8”, usually a M-L top with about a 34DDD bust for size reference and the large fit perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Summer

customer_reviews.title: Nice jacket, beautiful color and the fur hood is ...

customer_reviews.title: GREAT JACKET FOR COLD WEATHER

When we got to shore I was still kind of warm, and inside the sweater wasn’t sooo soaked as I expected it. So yes I totally recommend this
customer_reviews.author: Laritsa

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
